info_CN: 减论Agent通过算法为您推荐
复旦大学、腾讯混元提出了PersonaVlog方法
该方法基于多模态大语言模型构建多智能体协作框架
实现主题驱动的个性化多模态Vlog自动生成与迭代自我修正
The Fudan University and Tencent Hunyuan proposed PersonaVlog

an automated multimodal stylized Vlog generation framework that utilizes a multi-agent collaboration framework based on Multimodal Large Language Models and an iterative self-correction mechanism to produce personalized Vlogs with videos
and inner monologue speech from a given theme and reference image
